channel.title: CAMGDP – telegram
channel.description: Recent content in telegram on CAMGDP

item.title: Sources: Batyr Jamal
item.description: Founded in 2021, Batyr Jamal is a women-oriented media with coverage primarily focusing on women’s rights, safety, and self-worth. Available on Instagram and Telegram.

item.title: Sources: Factcheck.kz
item.description: Founded in 2017, Factcheck.kz is a publication focuses on fact checking news and viral media. Available on Instagram, Telegram, TikTok, and YouTube.

item.title: Sources: Fading.TSE
item.description: Fading.TSE is a grassroots project documenting urban history of Kazakhstan and its capital. Primary focused on photography, oral histories, and cultural heritage. Available in Kazakh and Russian on Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, and Telegram.

item.title: Sources: HolaNews
item.description: Founded in 2012, HolaNews offers coverage of current events in Kazakhstan on Instagram, Facebook, and Telegram.

item.title: Sources: Til Kespek Joq
item.description: Founded in 2020, Til Kespek Joq offers coverage of current events in Kazakhstan. Available in Kazakh on Instagram, Telegram, Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, and YouTube.

item.title: Sources: Women of Kazakhstan
item.description: Women of Kazakhstan is a first online museum of documenting the past and present of Kazakhstani women with a focus on historical research. Available in English, Kazakh, and Russian on Instagram, Twitter, and Telegram.
